Demonstrations Listed by Top-Level Domain

See the quick tour for a smaller set of demos that highlight the key features of Ptolemy II.

Ptolemy II Domains

  • CT (Continuous Time)
  • DDF (Dynamic Dataflow)
  • DE (Discrete Events)
  • FSM (Finite State Machines)
  • PN (Process Networks)
  • Ptera (Ptolemy Event Relationship Actor)
  • SDF (Synchronous Dataflow)

Continuous Time (CT)

An earlier implementation of Continuous Time semantics, for use with the Finite State Machine.
  • Brownian
  • Poisson
  • Sampled Clocks
  • Satellite
  • Ball Bouncing on a Sinusoidal Surface
  • Square Wave Response
  • Static Units

Dynamic Dataflow (DDF)

  • Eratosthenes
  • Factorial
  • IfThenElse
  • Loop
  • OrderedMerge
  • RandomWalk
  • RijndaelEncryption

Discrete Events (DE)

  • Inspection Paradox
  • Long Runs
  • Modal Model
  • Parallel Execution (New in Ptolemy II 8.0)
  • Pong (Requires Java 3D, see the GR domain) (New in Ptolemy II 8.0)
  • Real Time Composite
  • (New in Ptolemy II 8.0)
  • Router
  • Smart Sender
  • Timing Paradox
  • Variable Delay

Finite State Machine (FSM)

  • Alternating Bit
  • Chained Transitions
  • Blending (In the full version of Ptolemy: with codegen)
  • Modal Binary Symmetric Channel (In the full version of Ptolemy: with codegen)
  • State Tracker

Process Networks (PN)
  • Brock-Ackerman Anomaly
  • Nondeterministic Merge
  • Nondeterministic Merge with Feedback
  • Ordered Merge
  • Remove Nil Tokens
  • QR
  • Stack (New in Ptolemy II 8.0)

Synchronous Dataflow (SDF)

  • Animate Vergil
  • Array
  • ApplyFFT
  • Butterfly (In the full version of Ptolemy: with codegen)
  • Case
  • Communications demos: ConvolutionalCoder, Scrambler, TrellisDecoder, ViterbiDecoder
  • DFT Subset
  • Expression
  • Eye Diagram
  • Fixed-Point FIR Filter
  • Fixed-Point Arithmetic
  • Fourier Series
  • Karplus-Strong Sound Synthesis
  • LMS Adaptive Filter
  • LogisticMap
  • ModelDisplay
  • Model Reference
  • Multiple Runs
  • NoisySinewave
  • Objects (New in Ptolemy II 8.0)
  • Maximum Entropy Spectrum
  • Network Integration
  • Rijndael Encryption
  • Sketched Signal
  • Slider Parameter and Port Parameters
  • Spectrum
  • Sound Spectrum
  • SynthesizedVoice
